<rule id="technology-usage-connect-01200" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <javaclass references="javax.mail.{*}"/>
                    <javaclass references="com.sun.mail.{*}"/>
                    <javaclass references="org.simplejavamail.{*}"/>
                    <javaclass references="org.apache.commons.mail.{*}"/>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Mail usage">
                    <description>Mailing is used in the application</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-identified name="Mail">
                    <tag name="Connect"/>
                    <tag name="Other"/>
                    <tag name="Java EE"/>
                </technology-identified>
            </perform>
        </rule>
